name: ShadowCore VR
description:
Over time corporations have shifted from controlling behind the scenes to absolute power. Which one represents you?

ShadowCore is a hero-light, virtual reality, action paced, multiplayer shooter in Sci-Fi. Focused on small to medium tactical engagements. Supporting skilled shooting in combination with easy to access gear.

Hotjoin any game in progress using a respawn system that places you right next to the action. Expertly time/coordinate your abilities/weapons with your team. With map design that supports small squad tactics. Lastly, you can choose to fight for an objective or kill them all.

Key features:
- Free locomotion
- Full head/directional tracking with rotation support
- 3 distinct character classes, each with a main weapon with alt-fire, wrist weapon, and a special ability
- 2 maps
- 3 different game modes
- 5v5 Online/Local Multiplayer
- Hot-join in game
